example.metadescription: KoolComboBox extends the capability of combobox to the max.Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.
example.description: This advanced example show you how to apply autocomplete to KoolComboBox for selecting email address.
